import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update an Access Key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/providers/{provider_id}/orgs/{org_id}/key"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the access key details like user role and bucket access permissions.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"provider_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Provider ID","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"org_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Organization ID","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details

      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >

          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_id"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user for whom the access key is being updated"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"id"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"Access key ID"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_role"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"OrgMembership (string)"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`Admin`, `Member`]"}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"Role assigned to the user in the organization","enum":["Admin","Member"],"title":"OrgMembership"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={true}
          className={"schemaItem"}
        >
          <details
            style={{}}
            className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
          >
            <summary
              style={{}}
            >
              <span
                className={"openapi-schema__container"}
              >
                <strong
                  className={"openapi-schema__property"}
                >
                  buckets_roles
                </strong><span
                  className={"openapi-schema__name"}
                >
                   object[]
                </span>
              </span>

              style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
            >
              <li>
                <div
                  style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}
                >
                  Array [
                </div>
              </li><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"bucket_name"}
                required={true}
                schemaName={"string"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"string","description":"Name of the bucket"}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"role"}
                required={true}
                schemaName={"string"}
                qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ReadOnly`, `Editor`, `Admin`]"}
                schema={{"type":"string","description":"The role assigned to the access key defines the permissions (read,\nwrite, admin) for the associated bucket.\n\n- `ReadOnly`: Read-only access to the bucket.\n- `Editor`: Read and write access to the bucket.\n- `Admin`: Full access to all the buckets in org, including management of\n  permissions. Since, this access key manages all the buckets, the value of `bucket_name`\n  field should always be `*`.\n\n  Example:\n  ```\n  {\n    \"bucket_name\": \"*\",\n    \"role\": \"Admin\"\n  }\n  ```\n","enum":["ReadOnly","Editor","Admin"],"x-enumDescriptions":{"ReadOnly":"Read-only access to the bucket","Editor":"Read and write access to the bucket","Admin":"Full access to all the buckets in org, including management of permissions"}}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><li>
                <div
                  style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}
                >
                  ]
                </div>
              </li>
            </div>
          </details>
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>
